title: Video FDA warns 3 major infant formula makers over contamination concerns
author: ABC News
description: The Food and Drug Administration sent new warning letters to three formula companies citing contamination concerns inside Reckitt/Mead Johnson, Perrigo and ByHeart facilities.
cleaned_text: FDA warns 3 major infant formula makers over contamination concerns The Food and Drug Administration sent new warning letters to three formula companies citing contamination concerns inside Reckitt/Mead Johnson, Perrigo and ByHeart facilities.
